MNC Lab (Mobile Networking & Computing Lab)

Our lab focuses on next-generation mobile networking systems including Internet of Vehicles (IoV), Content-Centric Networking (CCN), and Edge Computing. We aim to design scalable, intelligent, and efficient communication systems.

Research Areas

  • Vehicular Networks & IoV
  • Content Caching & Delivery
  • Edge Computing Systems
  • AI-driven Network Optimization

Facilities

  • Vehicular mobility simulation testbed
  • Network protocol emulation platform
